name: A demonstration meeting with Solid
description: The purpose of this meeting is to show you how to run a productive and actionable meeting, with a little help from Solid.

agenda.title: Set the goal of the meeting

notes.title: Create a new agenda item and add notes. Write down what you think Solid is for.
This meeting is planned to last 30 minutes. The timer started automatically and displays the remaining time before the meeting is over.

agenda.title: Set the agenda and take notes

notes.title: The agenda lists all the topics of discussion for the meeting. Each one can contain notes like this one. Notes can also be tasks, decisions and open issues.
Create a new agenda item and add notes. Write down what you think Solid is for.
